2023 Travelers' Choice Best of the Best
Un hôtel 5 étoiles au coeur de Paris ! Grâce à sa situation privilégiée, à la fois historique et culturelle, le Grand Hôtel du Palais Royal bénéficie d'atouts uniques au cœur de Paris. A deux pas du Palais Royal et de son romantique jardin à la française, avoisinant le Louvre, et le Jardin des Tuileries, il offre un véritable havre de paix dans la capitale.

Reviews Summary
This summary was created by AI, based on recent reviews.
Powered by AI
The Grand Hotel du Palais Royal, according to many guests, is praised for its cleanliness and efficient housekeeping service, along with a clean spa. Many travelers describe the hotel's atmosphere as comfortable and stylish, despite some feeling that the bar lacks atmosphere. While the hotel offers a premium experience, some travelers warn that it can be expensive. The top-notch amenities and superb location close to attractions like the Louvre earn rave reviews. Rooms are generally appreciated for their comfort and cleanliness, and the service frequently gets called out for its efficiency and friendliness.

Amazing Pariz experience
The experience a the Grand Hotel du Palais Royal is exceptional. The staff accommodate any need. From the time you are greeted by Rafael (the bell stand), the front desk and their conncierge they really make you feel special. It is a personalized experience.

The location is ideal. literally a few steps from the Louvre entrance. The convenience to walk around Paris and be able to go back within minutes to your room in a few minutes to refresh is unbeatable.

This is definitively one of the best hotels I have stayed in Paris!

Great food and don't miss the amazing breakfast croissants at Cafe 52!!

Adam M wrote a review Jan 2024
1 contribution
Holiday trip
I have stayed at this hotel on a number of occasions. I returned to this hotel because each occasion is super. This is the ideal city hotel. The staff are attentive courteous and reacting immediately.

The hotel is situated in the most perfect location. Within a Brief walk you can be at the Louve or the muse Dorsay. Going in the opposite direction, you can walk through the splendid gardens of the Royal Palace. You sit almost on top of the rue de Rivoli and on the sunny day you are in the best place in Paris.

I don’t want to say too much more because I don’t want anyone else to go there. I’m quite happy for just myself and my family to stay there!

Parisian experience at its best !
I stayed at the Grand hotel for 3 days, and it was the best experience i ever had in Paris. The whole team was toughtful, they really took care of us. Clementine was great at the check-in time, and offered us a glass of champagne.
The renovated room are amazing, we loved the decoration and the quality of the furniture. Thanks to the guest relation team for the special amenities in the room and the attention.
The breakfast was beyond ours expectations, the french "viennoiseries" are delicious, and the buffet is full of choices. Special thanks to Valerie for her careness and kindness.
Don't hesitate if you're looking for a great location in the first district of Paris, close to the Louvre, and all the touristics sites. Highly recomanded !

Michele H wrote a review Jan 2024
Laguna Niguel, California17 contributions18 helpful votes

Beautiful Hotel/Highest Service/Perfect Location: it has it ALL
This is one of the best hotel experiences we have ever had! It was recommended and booked by our travel agent that we trust completely. It was our first visit to Paris and we were overjoyed by the service and beautiful hotel. It is small and they welcomed us by name each time we stepped through the lobby. Alexandre gave us many suggestions for restaurants and overall getting around and would chat with us after our adventures. Jeremy and Collette took care of us in the intimate bar with their tasty cocktails (LOVED the French Kisser and make it at home now!). They would stay late to take care of us after our evening out and always greeted with a smile. We had a beautiful upgraded room and the housekeeping was amazing. Almost felt like they were always right out side the door. The breakfast each morning was delicious and we looked forward to it. The location makes it even more perfect as it’s next to Jardin du Palais Royal and walking distance to the Louvre, Tuilleries and great shops/restaurants. You will love it!
